commentBody:
In what normal world does anyone expect Trump, with zero experience in governance, to make intelligent choices. The clueless angry white voters who elected him never, ever gave any thought to what an intellectual lightweight their candidate was in terms of intelligence, experience and pragmatism. Shading the truth is the least of Trump's shortcomings. His incompetence is just beginning to shine. Republicans will find they have no choice but to push back against Trump, who now is the poster boy for the Peter Principle. For those who are not familiar with this. its primary premise is that people rise to their level of incompetence. Trump has truly arrived at his.

Eclectic Pragmatist — http://eclectic-pragmatist.tumblr.com/
Eclectic Pragmatist — https://medium.com/eclectic-pragmatism
